PageConverter - Class in org.primaresearch.dla.page.converter

run(String, String) - Method in class org.primaresearch.dla.page.converter.PageConverter

S

setGtsId(String, String) - Method in class org.primaresearch.dla.page.converter.PageConverter
Sets the GtsId that is to be added to the PAGE document.
Note: The ID has to be conform to the XML ID convention (start with letter, ...).
setTargetSchema(String) - Method in class org.primaresearch.dla.page.converter.PageConverter
Sets the target PAGE XML schema version of the output file.
setTextFilterRules(VariableMap) - Method in class org.primaresearch.dla.page.converter.PageConverter
Sets the filter rules that are to be applied to all text regions.
